projects.name: NASA API Project
projects.label: NASA API Project
projects.content: This website was developed as part of a project to study and demonstrate the use of NASA’s public APIs. The goal is to explore how various technologies can be integrated to provide space data, images, and scientific events in an accessible way.

projects.name: CHD Digital Point
projects.label: CHD Digital Point
projects.content: CHD Ponto Digital is a system developed for academic purposes, aimed at the management and recording of employee points. It allows efficient control of entry and exit times during business hours, using Java for system logic and a web interface built with React, Shadcn-UI, TailwindCSS and Vite.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.label: Pokedex
projects.content: The Pokédex Project is a website that allows users to browse and search for Pokémon, displaying information. Gets data from the PokéAPI to provide real-time updates on Pokémon characteristics.
